input.sentences: [male] decided to help his friends clean up their backyard .
they started with the old trees .
they were cut down and examined for plagues .
it took a team effort to get rid of all the dead trees .
it gave space for new young saplings .
output.sentences: The men are gathered discussing serious business.
This is a great day to get together while it's sunny and bright.
I wonder why this tree is marked with red ink.
These men must be studying the life of trees.
That is a nice tree growing strong with help from the enforcement around it.
